title: Welcome to my Blog
text: This is the first post in a Quarto blog.

title: Welcome to my Blog
text:
What is Quarto?
First and foremost, using Quarto one can easily deploy a website, a blog post, a presentation, a static html page, or you name it.
This blog is a Quarto project which I edit in RStudio.
Its sources are hosted at GitHub and deployed as a static site using GitHub Pages.

title: About
text:
My name is Ralph-Uwe Börner.
I teach geophysics at the Technische Universität Bergakademie Freiberg.
My research interests are:

Theory of electromagnetic methods in geophysics
Potential theory and its applications in geophysics
Numerical simulation of Maxwell’s equations
MATLAB and Julia
